General.Name: Axcen Photonics
General.Description: Axcen Photonics Corporation specializes in photonic integration of optical, mechanical, and electrical design of manufacturing professional-grade optical transceiver modules in Taiwan. It offers 25G SFP28, video small form factor pluggable (SFP), compact SFP, 10G SFP+, 1x9, SFP, copper SFP, bi-directional SFP with single LC receptacle, BIDI 1x9, 2x5 small form factor (SFF), gigabit Ethernet passive optical network SFF, and coarse wavelength division multiplexing SFP transceiver modules. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 119 Baozhong Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 231
